deep_strike.name: Deep Strike
deep_strike.rule: During the Declare Battle Formations step, you can set this unit up in Reserves instead of setting it up on the battlefield. If you do, in the Reinforcements step of one of your Movement phases, you can set this unit up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from all enemy models.

infiltrators.name: Infiltrators
infiltrators.rule: During the Declare Battle Formations step, models in this unit can be set up anywhere on the battlefield that is more than 9" horizontally away from the enemy deployment zone and all enemy models.

scouts_6.name: Scouts 6"
scouts_6.rule: After both players have deployed their armies, this unit can make a Normal move of up to 6". It cannot end this move within 9" of any enemy models.

oath_of_moment.name: Oath of Moment
oath_of_moment.rule: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponentâ€™s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a model from your army with this ability makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

lone_operative.name: Lone Operative
lone_operative.rule: Unless part of an Attached unit, this model cannot be targeted by ranged attacks unless the attacking model is within 12".

stealth.name: Stealth
stealth.rule: Each time a ranged attack targets this unit, subtract 1 from the Hit roll.

leader.name: Leader
leader.rule: This model can be attached to another unit. See the Leader rules for details on which units it can join and how Attached units work.

feel_no_pain.name: Feel No Pain X+
feel_no_pain.rule: Each time a model with this ability suffers damage, roll one D6. On a result equal to or greater than the value specified (e.g., 5+), that point of damage is ignored.

fights_first.name: Fights First
fights_first.rule: Models in a unit with this ability are eligible to fight in the Fights First step of the Fight phase.

sustained_hits.name: Sustained Hits X
sustained_hits.rule: Each time a model makes an attack with this ability, a Critical Hit (usually an unmodified Hit roll of 6) scores a number of additional hits equal to the value specified (e.g., Sustained Hits 1 scores 1 additional hit).

lethal_hits.name: Lethal Hits
lethal_hits.rule: Each time a model makes an attack with this ability, a Critical Hit (usually an unmodified Hit roll of 6) automatically wounds the target.

devastating_wounds.name: Devastating Wounds
devastating_wounds.rule: Each time a model makes an attack with this ability, a Critical Wound (usually an unmodified Wound roll of 6) inflicts Mortal Wounds equal to the weapon's Damage characteristic, instead of any normal damage.

precision.name: Precision
precision.rule: Each time a model makes an attack with this ability, a Critical Hit (usually an unmodified Hit roll of 6) allows the attack to be allocated to a Character model in the target unit, even if other models are present.

twin_linked.name: Twin-linked
twin_linked.rule: Each time an attack is made with a weapon that has this ability, you can re-roll the Wound roll.

torrent.name: Torrent
torrent.rule: Weapons with this ability automatically hit their target. Do not make a Hit roll.

ignores_cover.name: Ignores Cover
ignores_cover.rule: The target of an attack made with a weapon that has this ability cannot have the Benefit of Cover.

hazardous.name: Hazardous
hazardous.rule: After a unit shoots or fights with a weapon that has this ability, it must take a Hazardous test. For each weapon, roll one D6. On a 1, the bearer's unit suffers a number of mortal wounds, and the model is destroyed if it is a Character, Monster, or Vehicle.

anti_keyword.name: Anti-X Y+
anti_keyword.rule: Each time an attack is made with a weapon that has this ability against a target with the specified keyword (X), a successful Wound roll of the specified value (Y+) scores a Critical Wound.
